message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to meet your specific needs, valued at $10000 to you. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $9500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a piece that holds significant value for you at a discounted rate. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
